articles.title: 9 Killed In US Strikes On Iran-Linked Site In Syria: Report - NDTV
articles.description: US warplanes carried out a strike on an Iran-linked weapons storage facility in eastern Syria on Wednesday in response to attacks against American personnel, US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said.
articles.content:
It is the second time in roughly 2 weeks that the US has targeted a location in Syria. (Representational)

articles.author: John Bacon, Jorge L. Ortiz
articles.title: Qatar reportedly working deal to free some Hamas hostages, including Americans: Live updates - USA TODAY
articles.description: Israel says specialized units are searching Hamas tunnels for rocket assembly lines, stores of small arms and mortars, Hamas leaders and hostages.
articles.content: Qatari and U.S. officials are attempting to work out a deal between Israel and Hamas for the potential release of a dozen or more hostages held in Gaza, including Americans, in exchange for a short c… [+8914 chars]
